content:
Action:1

I'm pushing left to move the box at (2,5) into (2,4) so that with subsequent moves I'll be able to guide it toward the hole at (1,3).

Action:4
I’m moving up from (2,5) to (1,5) to start navigating around towards (3,3) so I can later push the box at (4,3) down into the hole at (6,3), aligning with our overall strategy.

Action:1

I'm moving left so that I can approach (1,4) and eventually head down toward (3,3) to push the box at (4,3) downward as planned.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (1,4) to (1,3) (even though it's a hole) to begin navigating around to reach the spot (3,4) below the box at (2,4) so I can push it upward toward the known hole.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (1,3) to (2,3) so I can later position behind the box at (4,3) (B2) to push it downward into the hole at (6,3), following our strategy.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,3) to (3,3) to position it above the second box at (4,3) so that I can push that box downward toward the hole at (6,3), following our strategy to focus on one box at a time.

Action:3

I'm pushing down to move the box at (4,3) from its position down to (5,3), which sets it up to be pushed into the hole at (6,3) on the next move.

Action:3

I'm pushing down from (4,3) to bump the box at (5,3) into the hole at (6,3), which should clear that box as planned.

Action:4

I'm moving UP to start following a planned route that will eventually position me at (2,5) to push the box left into the hole, and I expect to see the avatar move from (5,3) to (4,3).

Action:4

I'm moving up from (4,3) to (3,3) to approach the box and later reach (3,4) so I can push it upward into (1,4), preparing to score by sending it left into the hole at (1,3).

Action:2

I'm moving right to (3,4) so that I can later push the box upward toward the nearby hole, following the strategy for an incremental and careful maneuver.

Action:4

I'm moving up to push the box from (2,4) to (1,4), expecting to later maneuver behind it to push it left into the hole at (1,3).

Action:2

I'm moving right to transition towards a better position (aiming for row1, col5) so I can push the box left into the hole at row1, col3, following the strategic plan.

Action:4

I'm moving the knight UP from row2 col5 to row1 col5 to get into position behind the box at row1 col4, so that I can subsequently push it left into the hole at row1 col3 as strategized.

Action:1

I'm pushing left, which should make the avatar move into the box at (1,4) and push it into the hole at (1,3) to clear the box, aligning with our strategy.
